GSD.description:
Bluetooth: refactor malicious adv data check

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.265 by commit 5a539c08d743d9910631448da78af5e961664c0e. For more details please see the references link.
